text:
Hello, everyone!
I would love to invite you to an online conference HackConf 2021. It's a software development conference organized by developers, for developers. If you are one, join us! :raising_hand:
There are inspiring talks and practical workshops for everyone from a newbie to an expert. :technologist:

<https://www.facebook.com/events/247932666592381/?__cft__[0]=AZXFM6QZkOA6RhHcpUAybK6qUysM294sdqy-tpjVT1onBTzO-_IXH0-89FTbgVFk9Oukwy2eX4AjUehyklGEmCdYNa_sTONoxcpA7PqGf03kyI-f3XjB5q_VYLUxRN8uJhBlofuMqwB8RZ6kNup_GEGD&__tn__=-UK-R|HackConf 2021 Online> edition will be held on the 22-23rd of October entirely online, so you can join us from everywhere.
:small_orange_diamond: Friday (22.10) will have 18 inspiring talks on 3 different tracks. :speaking_head_in_silhouette:
:small_orange_diamond: Saturday (23.10) will cover 14 awesome practical workshops. :hammer_and_wrench:

Schedule of the program :point_right: <https://www.hackconf.bg/#schedule>
If you're interested to join and hear what the speakers got to share, or attend any of the practical workshops, take a ticket at :ticket: <http://www.hackconf.bg/#tickets|www.hackconf.bg/#tickets> :ticket: and enjoy the conference!
